post:
WebHosting UK Linux and Windows Virtual Private Servers are powered by Virtuozzo. A Virtuozzo VPS performs and executes exactly like a standalone physical dedicated server making it an ideal alternative to a dedicated server. All our VPS hosting plans are feature-rich, which offer total control, power and flexibility which most users desire. Our managed VPS Hosting is backed by our 24x7x365 Customer Support. Clients can seamlessly upgrade and downgrade between packages without any hassles and site downtime. WebHosting UK VPS hosting comprehends only the best in Managed, Scalable, and Powerful Enterprise Grade VPS technology. Feel the difference, signup for one of our VPS solutions today!

During sign up use the coupon code "WHTspecial" to avail 15% life time discount on any of the below virtual private servers.

Key features of Linux/Windows Virtual Private Servers include :-

  • Windows 2003 Enterprise with Windows VPS
  • Multiple OS Options for Linux VPS
  • Administrative Access to install Applications
  • Guaranteed RAM and Disk space
  • Host Multiple Domains
  • Unique IP addresses
  • Fully Managed
  • Ideal for test and development environments

Control Panel Options:-

  • cPanel / WHM: £5 per month
  • Plesk 30 Domains: £2 per month
  • Plesk 100 Domains: £4 per month
  • Plesk Unlimited Domains: £5 per month
  • Plesk Power Pack: £3 per month
  • Plesk AntiVirus by Dr.Web: £4 per month
